channel.title: Open Source on VMware Tanzu - Developer Advocates
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on VMware Tanzu - Developer Advocates

item.title: Tiffany Jernigan
item.description: Tiffany is a senior developer advocate at VMware and is focused on the realm of Kubernetes. She mostly recently was working as a software developer and developer advocate (nerd whisperer) for containers at Amazon. She also formerly worked at Docker and Intel. Prior to that, she graduated from Georgia Tech with a degree in electrical engineering. In her free time she likes to spend time with her fianc√©, family, and friends as well as dabble in photography.
